inclusion.criterion: Children aged 2 -15 years with refractory epilepsy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Willing to come for regular follow up
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No motivational or psychosocial issues in the family which would preclude compliance
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Surgically remediable cause for refractory epilepsy
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Suspected mitochondrial disorder or diagnosed with a disorder in which high fat diet is contraindicated
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has history of severe intellectual disability, CHF, and epilepsy. He was recently tapered off Dilantin and had no further events during the hospital course.
